404.body: Oops, it looks like the page you are looking for doesn  not exist.
barcode.infotext: This is the barcode for your library card. If you don't have your GU-card or library card available you can use this barcode in the self-service machines.
charges.acceptTerms: I am aware that fines and replacement fees paid can not be refunded.
charges.noCharges: You have no fines or charges
charges.paymentInformation: When you return the book, the replacement fee will automatically disappear. You will still have to pay the overdue fines.
charges.paymentNotAllowed: You will receive an invoice with your fines.
charges.paymentDisabledMessage:
Technical error
It is not possible to make payments at the moment. Please try again later, or visit one of our libraries and pay fines and fees with your credit card.
charges.moreInfoLinkText: More information about loans and fines
checkouts.author: Author
checkouts.title: Title
checkouts.renewal.information:
Do you have loans that are automatically renewed?

Automatically renewed means that you don't have to renew the loans yourself. They will be automatically renewed at the end of the loan period, unless the items have been requested by someone else.

You will receive a message when you need to return your loans.

details.update.unknown_error: An unexpected error occured when saving details, please try again later
details.update.validation_error: One or more required fields are missing or contain invalid data
details.update.password_error.short_pass: Password must be at least 8 characters long
details.update.password_error.long_passw: Password must be at most 16 characters long
details.update.password_error.requires_d: Password must contain at least one digit
details.update.password_error.requires_l: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
details.update.password_error.requires_u: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
details.update.password_error.requires_s: Password must contain at least one special character: !#%/(){}[]=*><@$_-.,;:
details.update.password_error.contains_i:
Password contains invalid characters
Only: a-ö, A-ö, 0-9, !#%/(){}[]=*><@$_-.,;:

login.form.kohaErrorLoginMsg: You entered an incorrect username or password. Please try again! But note that passwords are case sensitive. Please contact a library staff member if you continue to have problems.

password_validation.name.too_long: Password is at most 16 characters long
password_validation.name.contains_invali: only letters, digits and valid special characters
renewals.messages.unknown_error: Failed to renew due to an unexpected error, please try again later
renewals.messages.renewal_error: It was not possible to renew the following titles:
renewals.messages.renewal_ok: The following titles has been renewed:
renewals.reason.auto_account_expired: Automatic renewal failed, your account has expired
renewals.reason.auto_too_much_oweing: Automatic renewal failed, you have unpaid fines
renewals.reason.too_much_oweing: Cannot renew, you have unpaid fines
renewals.reason.account_expired: Cannot renew. Your account has expired.
summary.debarments.header: You can request materials but not borrow because:
summary.debarments.AV: You are suspended. You cannot borrow, renew or request material.
summary.debarments.WR: You have not collected your GU card or library card. Students and staff collect their GU card at the university service centers. Members of the public collect their library card at one of our libraries
summary.debarments.GU: Your GU card is blocked. Contact university service centers to get help.
summary.debarments.CARD_EXPIRED: Your account has expired as of {expiration_date}. Please contact the library if you wish to renew your account.
summary.debarments.FINES_EXCEEDED: You have excessive overdue fines. Pay your fines to be able to borrow from the library again.
summary.debarments.NO_ADDRESS: We don't have your address registered. Fill in your address and contact the library so that we can unblock your account.
summary.debarments.CARD_LOST: You have reported your library card lost. Visit any of our libraries if you have found the card or need to buy a new one. Bring valid identification.
summary.debarments.OVERDUES: You have overdue items. Return items to be able to borrow from the library again. Pay any outstanding fines.
summary.debarments.footer: Contact the library if you have any questions.
